data.name: CreateReportData1
CreateReportData2
ReadJob
data.value: select top(1) NAME from CKT_JOB where NAME = @name

data.name: ReadJobRun
data.value: select top(1) START_TIMESTAMP, END_TIMESTAMP, STATUS, OUTPUT_TYPE, ERROR_MSG, PARM_INFO, JOB_NAME, SYSTEM_GEN_ID from CKT_JOB_RUN where (@jobName = JOB_NAME) and (SYSTEM_GEN_ID = @systemGenId)

data.name: UpdateJobRun1
data.value: update CKT_JOB_RUN set END_TIMESTAMP = @endTimestamp, STATUS = @status where (JOB_NAME = @jobName) and (SYSTEM_GEN_ID = @systemGenId)

data.name: UpdateJobRun2
data.value: update CKT_JOB_RUN set END_TIMESTAMP = @endTimestamp, STATUS = @status, ERROR_MSG = @errorMsg where (JOB_NAME = @jobName) and (SYSTEM_GEN_ID = @systemGenId)

data.name: UpdateJobRun3
data.value: update CKT_JOB_RUN set END_TIMESTAMP = @endTimestamp, STATUS = @status, ERROR_MSG = @errorMsg where (JOB_NAME = @jobName) and (SYSTEM_GEN_ID = @systemGenId)

data.name: UpdateJobRun4
data.value: update CKT_JOB_RUN set STATUS = @status where (JOB_NAME = @jobName) and (SYSTEM_GEN_ID = @systemGenId)
